alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Delaware County through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prattsville, or 18 miles northwest of Hunter, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roxbury and Stamford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
